title: Upper Canada Soap And Candle Naturally Whipped Hand Repair, Pressed Olive Avocado, 4-Ounce Tubes (Pack of 2)
description: Whipped Hand Repair is a rich formula to heal and protect skin to let natural beauty radiate. Naturally by Upper Canada soap is made with all natural ingredients and botanical extracts purposely chosen for their nourishing restorative properties to keep skin hydrated and looking it’s best. The Naturally line of bath and body products is free of harmful SLS, parabens, mineral oils, and synthetic dyes. Key ingredients include soybean oil, grape-seed oil, cocoa seed butter, aloe extract, dead sea salt, burrito seed and more. it's nourishment for the body and soul! Upper Canada Soap was founded in 1969 to bring quality, innovation and value in bath and body products. At Upper Canada, we are surrounded by nature and inspired by it. As a modern day apothecary, we use this inspiration to make affordable luxuries using nothing but the finest, purest ingredients. We draw upon the natural beauty and resources that our Canadian landscape offers, including clear Canadian waters, endless fields of botanical herbs, and natural minerals that have been the secret behind beauty products for generations.

title: Olay Professional Pro-X Intensive Firming Treatment Kit
description: Intensive Firming treatment is a mask and serum treatment regimen that helps increase skin's natural fullness for firmer skin.

title: RoC BRILLIANCE Eye Beautifier  .3 fl. oz.
description: The look of fine lines will be reduced before your eyes in as little as 3 days RoC Brilliance Eye Beautifier is a breakthrough at-home anti-aging eye treatment inspired by the latest professional procedures. This 2-step process starts working immediately to reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness and is clinically proven to smooth and tighten the look of delicate skin around the eyes.
